collection.body:
Future Insights

I redesigned the Future Insights website for 2013/14. Future Insights is a well known tech conference company that holds events across the globe. Future Insights is a family of tech events, hence the design was duplicated in four different colour palettes to represent each event type.

View Website
collection.summary: I redesigned the Future Insights website for 2013/14. Future Insights is a well known tech conference company that holds events across the globe. Future Insights is a family of tech events, hence the design was duplicated in four different colour palettes to represent each event type.
